name: The Matrix Style LoRA
description:
The Matrix LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Trained on examples from the first Matrix movie. Most examples have been generated using NeverEnding Dream (NED) at weight 1. I've also made one using AnyLoRA, wich is interesting, and the 6th one is using Realistic Vision by SG.

Triggers with the matrix, but works even without it adding a realistic styles to models. Could be a little too overpowering on mure realistic mixes, so tune the weight accordingly.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
